items.sentence: You don\'t have to eat that unless you want to.
You don\'t have to make up your mind right now.
You don\'t want to forget who your friends are.
I\'ll hold your bag while you put on your coat.
I\'ll let you know if anything strange happens.
I\'m trying to help you become a better person.
Tom has asked me to come to his house tomorrow.
Tom has been accused of stealing some bicycles.
Tom has been airlifted to a hospital in Boston.
Tom has been appointed administrative director.
